name: azureml-bdd-typescript
description: Azure ML BDD Tests - TypeScript Implementation

scripts.bdd: npx cucumber-js Features --require StepDefinitions/GoogleSearchSteps.ts --require StepDefinitions/AzureMLWorkspaceSteps.ts --require-module ts-node/register
scripts.bdd:headed: npx cucumber-js Features --require StepDefinitions/GoogleSearchSteps.ts --require StepDefinitions/AzureMLWorkspaceSteps.ts --require-module ts-node/register --world-parameters '{"headless":false}'
scripts.bdd:dry-run: npx cucumber-js Features --require StepDefinitions/GoogleSearchSteps.ts --require StepDefinitions/AzureMLWorkspaceSteps.ts --require-module ts-node/register --dry-run

author: Azure ML BDD Team
